title: Quick Take: Obama's Supreme Court Nominee
description: The President has nominated federal appeals court judge Merrick Garland to the Supreme Court. Some analysis of the pick — and what's next in the President's showdown with Senate Republicans. This episode: campaign reporter Scott Detrow, congressional correspondent Susan Davis, and justice correspondent Carrie Johnson. Find the NPR Politics team on Twitter, at nprpolitics.org, or email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
